text: Ludovico Vico (11 February 1952 â€“ 8 September 2021) was an Italian politician. He was born in Taranto, Italy. He was a member of the Italian Communist Party. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies of Italy from 2006 until 2013 and again from 2015 until 2018. Vico died on 8 September 2021 in Manduria, Italy at the age of 69. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Apulia
title: Ludovico Vico
